p: The addition of graphitic nanofibers can reduce the dehydrogenation temperatures [ 291]. Addition of TiF 3 leads to the decomposition of the mixed alanate even during ball-milling [ 290]. Attempts of re-hydrogenation were unsuccessful, even at high pressures [ 289, 290]. The structure of LiMg(AlH 4) 3 consists of a corner-sharing network of alternating [AlH 4] − tetrahedra and (LiH 6) and (MgH 6) octahedra ( Table 16 and Figure 24) [ 288]. The structure of LiMgAlH 6 consists of alternating AlMg 3 and Al 2Li 3 layers; in the Al 2Li 3 layer, the [AlH 6] − octahedra share edges with three (LiD 6) octahedra [ 206, 290].
